ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Teen bard looking for adventure.
ygData.msgSnippet: Polar Bear Cloak? Karg Icebear wanders the tundra, often passing by the North Tower. He will make a Polar Bear Cloak for A polar bear skin (cannot be ruined)
ygData.messageBody:
Polar Bear Cloak?

Karg Icebear wanders the tundra, often passing by the North Tower. He will
make a Polar Bear Cloak for A polar bear skin (cannot be ruined) and 5 pp.

I did this a bunch at your age.

Sylly Songsynger
(The Pantheon)
Minstrel somewhere on Innoruuk...

p.s. hire a ranger to track him for you and hang near Megan's Tower as he
patrols to there from the rivers - if he lives that long.

p.s.s. shamless cut and past from alla's quest database


-----Original Message-----
From: Jennifer McComb [mailto:mccomb@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 18, 2000 2:16 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Teen bard looking for adventure.


I made it to level 16 last night and now I'm tired of working only on
experience (been in Kunark since 12). I need some adventure, a quest,
a goal, something!

My Shaman husband (level 17) and I are planning a trip to Halas so he
can catch up on his training. I'll probably run over to Erudin to
pick up a couple of missing songs. After that, who knows. I'm
looking for something to do that has some goal attached to it. A
quest to complete or an item to obtain. Any suggestions?


Adagia, Wood Elf Bard of 16 Ayres
<Crimson Order of Norrath>, Druzzil Ro


------------------------------------------------------------------------
Failed tests, classes skipped, forgotten locker combinations.
Remember the good 'ol days
